title: Digne closes on £25m Villa move | 'I didn't expect to leave this way'
shortDescription: Lucas Digne has told Everton supporters that he "did not expect it to end this way" as he bids farewell ahead of his £25m move to Aston Villa.

title: Race for the Premier League top four examined
shortDescription: With the help of Sky Sports' Alan Smith, we assess the runners and riders in the race for the top four, their form and their fixtures until the end of the season...

title: 'Caged lion' Sanchez wins Inter Italian Super Cup
shortDescription: Alexis Sanchez's last-gasp goal in extra-time won the Italian Super Cup for Inter Milan, snatching a 2-1 victory over rivals Juventus.

title: Moyes tips Bowen for England call-up as West Ham beat Norwich
shortDescription: West Ham moved back into the Champions League places after sweeping aside rock-bottom Norwich 2-0 at the London Stadium in the Premier League on Wednesday.

title: Ronaldo: I'm not at Man Utd to compete for sixth or seventh
shortDescription: Cristiano Ronaldo says it is not acceptable for Man Utd to be aiming for anything less than a top-three Premier League finish this season.

title: Papers: Barcelona giving up on Dembele
shortDescription: All the top stories and transfer rumours from Thursday's national newspapers...

title: Rudiger: I have enjoyed this Chelsea chapter | Redknapp: Sign him up!
shortDescription: Chelsea's soon-to-be out-of-contract Antonio Rudiger said he has enjoyed this chapter of his career while Jamie Redknapp has urged the club to sign him up.

title: Chelsea ease past Spurs into Carabao Cup final
shortDescription: Chelsea booked their spot in the Carabao Cup final as they eased past Tottenham 3-0 on aggregate.

title: Hemp scores twice as Man City thrash Leicester to reach QFs
shortDescription: Manchester City booked their place in the Continental Cup knockouts with a 5-0 thrashing of Leicester City.

title: Ronaldo: Rangnick will do a good job at Utd
shortDescription: Cristiano Ronaldo says he expects Ralf Rangnick to do a good job at Manchester United but needs to be given time to turn things around.

title: Real reach Super Cup final with Saudi Clasico win
shortDescription: Real Madrid booked their ticket to the Spanish Super Cup final in Saudi Arabia courtesy of a 3-2 extra-time win over Barcelona - their fifth straight El Clasico victory.

title: Bowen stars in West Ham win
shortDescription: FREE TO WATCH: Highlights from West Ham's 2-0 win over Norwich in the Premier League

title: Gradel fires Ivory Coast to victory
shortDescription: Max Gradel's early goal was enough to secure the Ivory Coast a 1-0 win over Equatorial Guinea at the Africa Cup of Nations on Wednesday.

title: Barbosa to push for Flamengo exit with West Ham offer on table
shortDescription: Gabriel Barbosa is set to tell Flamengo that he wants to leave the club and move to England, with West Ham keen to sign the forward.

title: Early goal gives Gambia win on AFCON debut
shortDescription: Ablie Jallow scored early as Gambia made a winning debut in the Africa Cup of Nations finals, beating Mauritania 1-0 in Group F.

title: Millwall CEO: Booing players taking a knee is causing 'extensive damage'
shortDescription: Millwall's CEO has written to the club's supporters to urge them to stop booing players who take the knee before kick-off as it is causing "extensive damage".

title: Transfer Centre: Wednesday's PL round-up
shortDescription: The Transfer Show's Dharmesh Sheth and Kaveh Solhekol round up the latest transfer news from all 20 Premier League clubs.

title: AFCON: Early FT whistle prompts Tunisia-Mali chaos
shortDescription: The Africa Cup of Nations match between Tunisia and Mali was plunged into chaos on Wednesday after the full-time whistle was blown twice before the 90th minute.

title: Burnley striker Wood finalising £25m Newcastle move
shortDescription: Chris Wood has passed his medical and is set to finalise a £25m switch to Newcastle from Burnley.

title: Thursday at AFCON: Cameroon looking to seal last-16 spot
shortDescription: Dates, kick-off times and host cities - here's the full schedule for AFCON 2021.
